description: This table stores the provider summary information for a remittance image record.

columns.name: IMAGE_ID
columns.description: This is the ID for the remittance image record with related remit claim references.

columns.name: PROV_IDENTIFIER
columns.description: This is the provider number for the remittance record.

columns.name: FACILITY_TYPE
columns.description: This is the code identifying the type of facility where services were provided for the claim reimbursed by the remittance record.

columns.name: FP_DATE
columns.description: This is the last day of the providerï¿½s fiscal year.

columns.name: TOT_CLAIM_COUNT
columns.description: This is total number of claims.

columns.name: TOT_CLAIM_AMT
columns.description: This is the total reported charges for all claims.

columns.name: TOT_COV_AMT
columns.description: This is the monetary amount for the total covered charges. This is submitted charges less the non-covered charges.

columns.name: TOT_NONCOV_AMT
columns.description: This is the amount for the total of non-covered charges.

columns.name: TOT_DEN_AMT
columns.description: This is the monetary amount for the total of denied charges.

columns.name: TOT_PROV_AMT
columns.description: This is the monetary amount for the total provider payment. The total provider payment amount includes the total of all interest paid. The amount can be less than zero.

columns.name: TOT_INT_AMT
columns.description: This is the total amount of interest paid.

columns.name: TOT_CONT_AMT
columns.description: This is the amount for the total contractual adjustment.

columns.name: TOT_GRAM_AMT
columns.description: This is the amount for the total Gramm-Rudman adjustment.

columns.name: TOT_MSP_AMT
columns.description: This is the total Medicare Secondary Payer (MSP) primary payor amount.

columns.name: TOT_BLOOD_AMT
columns.description: This is the total blood deductible amount in dollars.

columns.name: TOT_NONLAB_AMT
columns.description: This is the summary of non-lab charges.

columns.name: TOT_COINS_AMT
columns.description: This is the total coinsurance amount.

columns.name: HCPCS_AMT
columns.description: This is the Health Care Financing Administration Common Procedural Coding System (HCPCS) reported charges.

columns.name: HCPCS_PAYABLE
columns.description: This is the total Health Care Financing Administration Common Procedural Coding System (HCPCS) payable amount.

columns.name: TOTAL_DEDUCT_AMT
columns.description: This is the total deductible amount.

columns.name: TOT_PROF_AMT
columns.description: This is the total professional component amount.

columns.name: PAT_MSP_LIABILITY
columns.description: This is the total Medicare Secondary Payer (MSP) patient liability met.

columns.name: PAT_REIMB_AMT
columns.description: This is the total patient reimbursement amount.

columns.name: PIP_CLAIM_CNT
columns.description: This is the total periodic interim payment (PIP) number of claims.

columns.name: PIP_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: This is the total periodic interim payment (PIP) adjustment.
